title: Angular speed of disk after 1 second

content.prompt: A disk with radius of 0.5 m is free to rotate around its center without friction. A string wrapped around the disk is pulled, as shown above, exerting a 2 N force tangent to the edge of the disk for 1 s. If the disk starts from rest, what is its angular speed after 1 s?

choices.label: It cannot be determined without knowing the rotational inertia of the disk.

topic.text: 5.6: Newton's Second Law in Rotational Form

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
